channel.title: [Advanced] Load Char. Files from Webhost
channel.description: Im trying to make my source load my character files from a webhost, But Im not sure how to. I am familiar with how to work MYSQL But Im Just very confused on the whole concept of it. Help me out if possible, But I doubt any coder can figure this out unless their advanced.

item.title: [Advanced] Load Char. Files from Webhost
item.dc:creator: @stefano1911 stefano1911
item.description:
@stefano1911 wrote:

u said i
I allready enabled the SQL Connection

u did not said that your sql.java file create’s tables…

only said something about connection?? lol

so i was saying you need to create a table it is possible with a file but you can do it yourself
2 you never said anything about tables didnt know u had that part already so why even talk bs to me u did not explained everything…

trying to help u

but idc learn a litle bit more about java,msql and do it all yourself ok??
and dont come here and insult people that trying to help u…
